thread.title: Anna Sui's Tahiti Travel Diary - Fashion Designer Inspirations, Beach Vacations
thread.title_full: Anna Sui's Tahiti Travel Diary - Fashion Designer Inspirations, Beach Vacations

author: Steff Yotka
title: Anna Sui's Tahiti Travel Diary - Fashion Designer Inspirations, Beach Vacations
text:
20 View the slideshow
Photo: Anna Sui
Hear the name Anna Sui and you immediately think of downtown Manhattan’s chicest eclectic wares—the bohemian dresses, vintage tees, and over-the-top outerwear the designer does so well. But while her collections carry a certain New York-by-way-of-fantasy ethos to them, Sui herself looks to another place to unwind: Tahiti. This summer, Sui and her extended family traveled together to the island for a trip that included beach visits, her uncle’s wedding, plenty of musical serenades, and—of course—a little bit of fashion research. Follow along with her Tahitian adventures in the slideshow.
